"A.P.238/4/9/12:30": "That's enough! That was great! You really showed me how hard you work!"
"...Hmm. Your performance was a little lacking!"
"But your spirit took you right to the finish line! That's all ARKS need!"
"You didn't win and you don't get the exhibition match, but your spirit proved itself!"
"Now, head on home! Everyone is waiting for you!"
"A flawless result! This was a brilliant plan! I'm a genius!"
"Well, it was really down to your effort as participants!"
"I've prepared a special reward, just for you!"
"Isn't that right! Claris Claes!"
"Absolutely right! I'll give you your reward right now!"
"A reward for good results! It's me!"
"An exhibition match with Number Five of the Council of Six, Third of the Three Heroes, Claris Claes!"

"What do you think?
It'll be fun, right?
Heheh, I bet you'll enjoy this so much you brag about it later!"
"It's rare that one of the Council of Six steps up to fight like this!"
"Huh? Hey, Huey, why don't they look happy?"
"They're just nervous about facing you! Don't worry! Everyone loves to train against someone stronger!"
"If that's it, just say so! Well, don't worry, ARKS, I'll do this properly!"
"That's it... OK! I'll face you with half, of half, of half of my power!"

"Come on, Clarissa! Half of a half of a half of a.... wait.
How many was that?"
"Ah, I can't be bothered with that, I'll just blow you to pieces!"
